    • Method Detail

      • castWithMana

        public boolean castWithMana(Integer requiredMana)
        Only casts the spell if the player has enough mana, does not take mana
        Parameters:
        requiredMana - the amount of mana required
        Returns:
        false if the player does not have enough mana or the spell failed, true if spell was cast sucessfully
